short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take a break from working online through beautiful image and interesting facts from around the world.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
We are now spending more time on the web and our laptops, where our eyes and minds are easily drained. With "Peace & View" take a break whenever you open a new tab. Each tab is replaced by a beautiful scenery photo and a fun fact. If you wish, you can submit your own image or fact to us and we will add to the upcoming versions. 

Image Credit: 
https://unsplash.com/

Fact Credit: 
https://www.rd.com/list/interesting-facts
https://www.thefactsite.com/top-100-random-funny-facts/

https://bestlifeonline.com/world-facts/
https://parade.com/1019661/marynliles/wtf-facts/
